com.opentok.cloud.controller
Interface SessionListener

public interface SessionListener

An event listener for session-related events in the session.

See Also:
Session.addSessionListener()

Method Summary
 void onSessionConnected(Session session)
          This Cloud Raptor app has connected to the session.
 void onSessionConnectFailed(Session session, java.lang.Exception exception)
          This Cloud Raptor app failed to connect to the session.
 void onSessionDisconnected(Session session, Connection.Reason reason)
          This Cloud Raptor app has disconnected from the session.
 

Method Detail

This Cloud Raptor app has connected to the session.

onSessionDisconnected

See Also:

onSessionConnectFailed

void onSessionConnectFailed(Session session,
                            java.lang.Exception exception)
This Cloud Raptor app failed to connect to the session.

Parameters:
session - The Session to which the Cloud Raptor app has connected.
exception - The exception describing the reason the connection failed.
